column.name: TypeCur
column.summary: Enum:ApptReminderType

Enumeration.name: ApptReminderType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 10 - PaymentPortal Msg-To-Pay, used to send msg-to-pay messages to patients. Currently not an AutoComm feature but doing this now so functionality can be easier added in the future.

column.name: ProcessingStatus
column.summary: Enum:CareCreditWebStatus Used to determine if the request is pending, needs action, or is completed.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Holds the salted hash of the following claim fields: ClaimFee, ClaimStatus, InsPayEst, InsPayAmt.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Holds the salted hash of the following claimproc fields: ClaimNum, Status, InsPayEst, InsPayAmt.

column.name: LocationID
column.summary: A unique identifier provided by the clearinghouse to identify the practice in their system. This is separate from the issue of clinics, where we already enforce only one clinic per clearinghouse.

column.name: ShowInAgeLimit
column.summary: If true, this codegroup will show in Age Limitations grid. Control of showing in Freq Lim is done separately using IsHidden.

column.name: CommSource
column.summary: Enum:CommItemSource Set to the source of the entity that created this commlog. E.g. WebSched.

column.name: OptOutSms
column.summary: Enum:CommOptOutType The type of communication for which this patient does not want to receive automated sms.

column.name: OptOutEmail
column.summary: Enum:CommOptOutType The type of communication for which this patient does not want to receive automated email.

column.name: Category
column.summary: Enum:DisplayFieldCategory If category is 0, then this is attached to a ChartView.

Enumeration.name: DisplayFieldCategory
Enumeration.EnumValue: 21 - SuperFamily Grid

column.name: OcrResponseData
column.summary: Stores a JSON serialized OcrInsScanResponse object. The type of this object is defined by the OcrCaptureType.

column.name: ImageCaptureType
column.summary: Enum:EnumOcrCaptureType 0=Miscellaneous, 1=PrimaryInsFront, 2=PrimaryInsBack, 3=SecondaryInsFront, 4=SecondaryInsBack. Only used when patient scans their insurance card from eClipboard.

Enumeration.name: EnumOcrCaptureType
Enumeration.summary: The type of image. Miscelllaneuous is for all images without special behavior.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0- Catch-All type for imageCaptures without unique behavior

column.name: OcrCaptureType
column.summary: Enum:EnumOcrCaptureType 0=Miscellaneous, 1=PrimaryInsFront, 2=PrimaryInsBack, 3=SecondaryInsFront, 4=SecondaryInsBack

Enumeration.name: EnumOcrCaptureType
Enumeration.summary: The type of image. Miscelllaneuous is for all images without special behavior.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0- Catch-All type for imageCaptures without unique behavior

column.name: OcrCaptureType
column.summary: Enum:EnumOcrCaptureType 0=Miscellaneous, 1=PrimaryInsFront, 2=PrimaryInsBack, 3=SecondaryInsFront, 4=SecondaryInsBack

Enumeration.name: EnumOcrCaptureType
Enumeration.summary: The type of image. Miscelllaneuous is for all images without special behavior.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0- Catch-All type for imageCaptures without unique behavior

column.name: MsgType
column.summary: Enum:EmailMessageSource This is used to identify where in the program this message originated from. This is used for sent email messages.

Enumeration.name: EmailMessageSource
Enumeration.summary: The different parts in the program that send an email message.
Enumeration.EnumValue: Payment Portal Msg-To-Pay message

column.name: EServiceAction
column.summary: Enum:eServiceAction

Enumeration.name: eServiceAction
Enumeration.EnumValue: 96 - Web Forms Form Downloaded.
97 - Web Forms Form Discarded.
98 - Web Forms Form Skipped.
99 - Web Forms Form Deleted.
100 - Web Forms Error.
101 - Web Forms Cancelled Import.

column.name: KeyType
column.summary: Enum:FKeyType

Enumeration.name: FKeyType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 5 Web Form Sheet Number.

column.name: MobileNotificationNum
column.summary: Mobile App devices periodically poll this table and retrieve any records that are relevant to the device itself, the user using the device, or the clinic the device belongs to. The mobile apps will then perform an action based on the mobile notification type.

column.name: NotificationType
column.summary: Enum:MobileNotificationType The type of notification. Example: TP. This will determine what actions the mobile app will perform upon retrieving this notification.

Enumeration.name: MobileNotificationType
Enumeration.summary: The different types of mobile notifications. Preserve order. CI = Checkin portion of app (eClipboard). ODM = ODMobile
Enumeration.EnumValue: Default.
Check-in a patient on a given device. For this type, the tag will have 3 items: the first name, last name, and birthdate of the patient in that order. The birthdate will be in DateTime.Ticks.
Tells the device that is currently filling out sheets to add a sheet to the list. For this type, the list of primary keys will have two items: the patnum and the SheetNum in that order.
Tells the device that is currently fillout out sheets to remove a sheet from the list. For this type, the list of primary keys will have two items: the patnum and the SheetNum in that order.

This mobile notification tells the device to stop whatever it is doing and go to a fresh checkin page. This may be a blank self-checkin or may be waiting for a mobile notification. This allows users from OD to "clear" the device of a stale patient. No primary keys or tags needed.

This mobile notification occurs when the preferences for this device's clinic changes. The tags for this mobile notification will be the EClipboardAllowSelfCheckIn(bool), EClipboardMessageComplete(string), EClipboardAllowSelfPortraitOnCheckIn(bool), and EClipboardPresentAvailableFormsOnCheckIn(bool) in that order.

This mobile notification occurs when the MobileAppDevice.IsAllowed changed for this device. The tag for this mobile notification will be IsAllowed (bool). If true then device which is currently awaiting in 'Not Allowed' state will try another login, should work this time. If false then force signout.

This mobile notification occurs when a permission has changed for a given OD user and they are no longer allowed to use OD Mobile. The ListPrimaryKeys may contain the UserNum of the user who is no longer allowed. This session will then be logged out of versioned OD Mobile. If ListPrimaryKeys IsNullOrEmpty() then assume all users for the given ClinicNum should be logged out. No UserNum filter necessary in this case.

This mobile notification occurs when a OD proper user sends a patients treatment plan to a specific device to show the user. ListPrimaryKeys => [MobileDataByteNum, PatNum, TreatPlanNum]. ListTags Keys => The treatPlan.Heading, hasPracticeSig(Obsolete; based on if TP sheet has SigBoxPractice) .

This mobile notification occurs when a TreatmentPlan is deleted in OD and we want to tell a specific device so that they can remove it when viewing TreatmentPlans. ListPrimaryKeys => [TreatPlan.PatNum,TreatPlan.TreatPlanNum]

This mobile notification occurs when a payment needs to be made on an eClip device. This either adds the Make Payment action item to the checkin checklist or it will open the QR code to scan from OD. ListPrimaryKeys => [TreatPlan.PatNum]

This mobile notification occurs when a patient is currently on the device, when a payment is made, when a new card is added (XWeb only), and when a new statement is created in OD. ListPrimaryKeys => [PatNum]

This mobile notification occurs when an OD proper user sends a payment plan to a specific device. ListPrimaryKeys => [MobileDataByte.MobileDataByteNum,PayPlan.PatNum,PayPlan.PayPlanNum] ListTags => [PayPlan.PayPlanDate]

This mobile notification occurs when a payment plan is removed from the associated eClip device or when a payment plan is removed from OD proper. This will remove a payment plan from user view on eClip. ListPrimaryKeys => [PayPlan.PatNum,PayPlan.PayPlanNum]

column.name: DeviceId
column.summary: The device id for the mobile notification. Example is random string of 10-12 characters. Only the device with this DeviceId will retrieve this record.

column.name: PrimaryKeys
column.summary: A comma-delimited list of primary keys associated with the mobile notification. See MobileNotificationType for what is included with each type. Can include MobileDataByteNums, TreatPlanNum, SheetNums, and others.

column.name: Tags
column.summary: A comma-delimited list of tags for this mobile notification. Can be anything. Different for each MobileNotificationType. See MobileNotificationType for what is included with each type.

column.name: DateTimeEntry
column.summary: DateTime notification was entered into Db. Should not be edited.

column.name: DateTimeExpires
column.summary: DateTime notification expires and becomes invalid.

column.name: MsgToPaySentNum
column.summary: PK. Generated by HQ.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum for the corresponding patient.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to patient.ClinicNum for the corresponding patient.

column.name: SendStatus
column.summary: Indicates status of message.

column.name: Source
column.summary: Source of this object. Can be Manual (implemented) or EConnectorAutoComm (not yet implemented).

column.name: MessageFk
column.summary: FK to primary key of appropriate table.

column.name: Subject
column.summary: Subject of the message.

column.name: Message
column.summary: Content of the message.

column.name: EmailType
column.summary: Only used for manually sent emails.

column.name: DateTimeEntry
column.summary: Generated by OD. Timestamp when row is created.

column.name: DateTimeSent
column.summary: DateTime the message was sent.

column.name: ResponseDescript
column.summary: Generated by OD in some cases and HQ in others. Any human readable error message generated by either HQ or EConnector. Used for debugging.

column.name: ApptReminderRuleNum
column.summary: FK to apptreminderrule.ApptReminderRuleNum. Allows us to look up the rules to determine how to send this apptcomm out.

column.name: ShortGUID
column.summary: Generated by HQ. Identifies this AutoCommGuid in future transactions between HQ and OD.

column.name: FieldType
column.summary: Enum:PatFieldType Text=0,PickList=1,Date=2,Checkbox=3,Currency=4

Enumeration.name: PatFieldType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 7 - CareCredit pre-approval amount.
8 - CareCredit - Remaining available Credit for CareCredit cardholders.

column.name: PatFieldPickItemNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: PatFieldDefNum
column.summary: FK to patfielddef.PatFieldDefNum

column.name: Name
column.summary: Full text of PickList item.

column.name: Abbreviation
column.summary: Abbr to show when PickList item is displayed in cramped spaces like columns. Only implemented in Superfamily grid so far.

column.name: IsHidden
column.summary: False for normal PickList items. Even if true/hidden, this item will still show in all the various windows where patient fields show. A hidden item will not normally show when picking from list for a patient unless the patient has already been assigned this item.

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: 0-based.

column.name: SequenceType
column.summary: Enum:PerioSequenceType eg probing, mobility, recession, etc.

Enumeration.name: PerioSequenceType
Enumeration.summary: In perio, the type of measurements for a given row.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 6. Sum of flags for bleeding(1), suppuration(2), plaque(4), and calculus(8).

column.name: WebFormSheetID
column.summary: Only set when this sheet was created from a Web Form. FK to webforms_sheet.SheetID within the Web Forms server. Used to determine if this particular Web Form has been retrieved before in order to avoid creating duplicate sheet entries for a single Web Form.

column.name: MsgType
column.summary: Enum:SmsMessageSource This is used to identify where in the program this message originated from.

Enumeration.name: SmsMessageSource
Enumeration.summary: This helps us determine how to handle messages.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 27. Used for Payment Portal Msg-To-Pay messages. Short Code Supported: NO

column.name: SequenceType
column.summary: Enum:PerioSequenceType eg probing, mobility, recession, etc.

Enumeration.name: PerioSequenceType
Enumeration.summary: In perio, the type of measurements for a given row.
